CustomField.description: Essentially maps to whether this was for an SM or for a GM. This value will be populated from process builder. 1= the first approval record created and the one designed for the SM. 2= the second approval record created and the one for the GM/pricing team. This field is created so that the time-based workflow rule knows when to cancel the second record rather than create an additional CLI. The second record never needs to expire.
CustomField.label: Approval Sequence
